name: 安东尼奥·索蒂洛
name_full: 安东尼奥·索蒂洛 Antonio Sotillo
introduction: Venezuelan actor known for his role as Pablo Morales in the Rosario Tijeras franchise third season. Born in Caracas, Venezuela, on August 2nd, 1991. Studied finances and administration and graduated with honors at Queens University of Charlotte, North Carolina, USA; making him fluent in both English and Spanish. He studied high school in Venezuela, where he performed school plays so his passion for acting comes from a young age. Moved to Mexico to study acting in the Centro de Educación Artística "CEA" Televisa which is an entertainment educational powerhouse in Mexico. Living in three countries have shaped Antonio culturally.
